Title: AN ACT AUTHORIZING PROVINCIAL BOARDS OF PROVINCES HAVING SUBPROVINCES TO APPROPRIATE FUNDS FOR QUARTERS FOR THE LIEUTENANT-GOVERNORS OF THEIR RESPECTIVE SUBPROVINCES.
Data:
[ Act No. 3774, November 28, 1930 ]
AN ACT AUTHORIZING PROVINCIAL BOARDS OF PROVINCES HAVING SUBPROVINCES TO APPROPRIATE FUNDS FOR QUARTERS FOR THE LIEUTENANT-GOVERNORS OF THEIR RESPECTIVE SUBPROVINCES.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. Provincial boards of provinces having subprovinces are hereby authorized to appropriate out of their general funds a sum not to exceed thirty pesos a month for quarters for the lieutenant-governors of their respective subprovinces.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, November 28, 1930.
